description: Internal Sensor Alarm
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CPQWCRM-MIB::alarmSensorInternal RFC1213-MIB::sysContact s EXAMPLE RFC1213-MIB::sysName s EXAMPLE RFC1213-MIB::sysLocation s EXAMPLE CPQWCRM-MIB::internalMsgIndex i 9999 CPQWCRM-MIB::internalMsgText s EXAMPLE CPQWCRM-MIB::internalMsgStatus i 1 CPQWCRM-MIB::internalSensorValue i 9999 CPQWCRM-MIB::cpqWcrmURL s EXAMPLE

description: The textual identification of the contact person
for this managed node, together with information
on how to contact this person.
variables.name: RFC1213-MIB::sysContact

description: An administratively-assigned name for this
managed node. By convention, this is the node's
fully-qualified domain name.
variables.name: RFC1213-MIB::sysName

description: The physical location of this node (e.g.
`telephone closet, 3rd floor').
variables.name: RFC1213-MIB::sysLocation

description: Index for the list of message entries. Its value ranges
between 1 and the value of cpqWcrmInternalNumberOfMsgs.
variables.name: CPQWCRM-MIB::internalMsgIndex

description: Descriptional text for each message (entry in the table)
variables.name: CPQWCRM-MIB::internalMsgText

description: Actual message status
1: not available
2: configuration has changed (sensor new, changed, lost)
3: error
4: OK
5: alarm, e.g. smoke, vibration...
6: warning of analog value, value reached warning threshold
7: analog value too low, value reached low threshold
8: analog value too high, value reached high threshold
9: output is set to ON
10: output is set to OFF
variables.name: CPQWCRM-MIB::internalMsgStatus

description: Value of sensor
variables.name: CPQWCRM-MIB::internalSensorValue

description: URL of the management interface in the format http[s]://ipaddr[:port#][/page]
variables.name: CPQWCRM-MIB::cpqWcrmURL

description: Water Cool Unit Sensor Alarm
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CPQWCRM-MIB::alarmSensorWaterCoolUnit RFC1213-MIB::sysContact s EXAMPLE RFC1213-MIB::sysName s EXAMPLE RFC1213-MIB::sysLocation s EXAMPLE CPQWCRM-MIB::waterCoolUnitMsgIndex i 9999 CPQWCRM-MIB::waterCoolUnitMsgText s EXAMPLE CPQWCRM-MIB::waterCoolUnitMsgStatus i 1 CPQWCRM-MIB::waterCoolUnitSensorValue i 9999 CPQWCRM-MIB::cpqWcrmURL s EXAMPLE

description: The textual identification of the contact person
for this managed node, together with information
on how to contact this person.
variables.name: RFC1213-MIB::sysContact

description: An administratively-assigned name for this
managed node. By convention, this is the node's
fully-qualified domain name.
variables.name: RFC1213-MIB::sysName

description: The physical location of this node (e.g.
`telephone closet, 3rd floor').
variables.name: RFC1213-MIB::sysLocation

description: Index for the list of alarm entries. Its value ranges
between 1 and the value of cpqWcrmWaterCoolUnitNumberOfMsgs.
variables.name: CPQWCRM-MIB::waterCoolUnitMsgIndex

description: Descriptional text for each message (entry in the table)
variables.name: CPQWCRM-MIB::waterCoolUnitMsgText

description: Actual message status
4: OK
5: alarm
6: warning
7: analog value too low, value reached low threshold
8: analog value too high, value reached high threshold
variables.name: CPQWCRM-MIB::waterCoolUnitMsgStatus

description: Value of sensor added to traps, msg index also added (waterCoolUnitMsgIndex)
If msg index = 1, 5 or 6
This value represents the actual Server Intake Temperature.
If msg index = 2:
This value represents the bit coded warning condition
Bit 0: Top Fan Module Failed
Bit 1: Middle Fan Module Failed
Bit 2: Bottom Fan Module Failed
Bit 3: Top HEX Intake Air Temperature Sensor to Server Failed
Bit 4: Top HEX Exhaust Air Temperature Sensor from Server Failed
Bit 5: Middle HEX Intake Air Temperature Sensor to Server Failed
Bit 6: Middle HEX Exhaust Air Temperature Sensor from Server Failed
Bit 7: Bottom HEX Intake Air Temperature Sensor to Server Failed
Bit 8: Bottom HEX Exhaust Air Temperature Sensor from Server Failed
Bit 9: Air Temperature Sensor Failed
Bit 10: Top Fan not installed
Bit 11: Middle Fan not installed
Bit 12: Bottom Fan not installed
Bit 13: Waterflow low
Bit 14: Water Unit Temperature Input Out of Range
Bit 15: Water Unit Temperature Output Out of Range
Bit 16: Waterflow Sensor Value Out of Range
Bit 17: Water Valve Failed
Bit 18: Leakdetector Failed
Bit 19: Heat Load Warning
Bit 20: The Condensation Pump has exceeded the max. number of cycles
Bit 21: The Condensation Pump has exceeded the max. Running Time
If msg index = 3:
This value represents the bit coded alarm condition
Bit 0: Leakage Detected
Bit 1: Comm. Failure IIC
variables.name: CPQWCRM-MIB::waterCoolUnitSensorValue

description: URL of the management interface in the format http[s]://ipaddr[:port#][/page]
variables.name: CPQWCRM-MIB::cpqWcrmURL

description: Internal Unit Alarm
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CPQWCRM-MIB::alarmInternal RFC1213-MIB::sysContact s EXAMPLE RFC1213-MIB::sysName s EXAMPLE RFC1213-MIB::sysLocation s EXAMPLE CPQWCRM-MIB::cpqWcrmInternalText s EXAMPLE CPQWCRM-MIB::cpqWcrmInternalStatus i 1 CPQWCRM-MIB::cpqWcrmURL s EXAMPLE

description: The textual identification of the contact person
for this managed node, together with information
on how to contact this person.
variables.name: RFC1213-MIB::sysContact

description: An administratively-assigned name for this
managed node. By convention, this is the node's
fully-qualified domain name.
variables.name: RFC1213-MIB::sysName

description: The physical location of this node (e.g.
`telephone closet, 3rd floor').
variables.name: RFC1213-MIB::sysLocation

description: Descriptional text for sensor unit connected to port 1
variables.name: CPQWCRM-MIB::cpqWcrmInternalText

description: General Status sensor unit connected to port 1
(1) OK
(2) error, e. g. value overflow
(3) configuration of sensor unit has changed, confirmation required
(4) reset from sensor unit to confirm configuration changes
(5) timeout of sensor unit, confirmation required to unload this unit
(6) sensor unit detected, needs to be confirmed
(7) unit is not available
(8) supply voltage is too low
variables.name: CPQWCRM-MIB::cpqWcrmInternalStatus

description: URL of the management interface in the format http[s]://ipaddr[:port#][/page]
variables.name: CPQWCRM-MIB::cpqWcrmURL

description: Water Cool Unit System Alarm
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CPQWCRM-MIB::alarmWaterCoolUnit RFC1213-MIB::sysContact s EXAMPLE RFC1213-MIB::sysName s EXAMPLE RFC1213-MIB::sysLocation s EXAMPLE CPQWCRM-MIB::cpqWcrmWaterCoolUnitText s EXAMPLE CPQWCRM-MIB::cpqWcrmWaterCoolUnitStatus i 1 CPQWCRM-MIB::cpqWcrmURL s EXAMPLE

description: Descriptional text for sensor unit connected to port 2
variables.name: CPQWCRM-MIB::cpqWcrmWaterCoolUnitText

description: General Status sensor unit connected to port 2
(1) OK
(2) error
(3) configuration of sensor unit has changed, confirmation required
(4) reset from sensor unit to confirm configuration changes
(5) timeout of sensor unit, confirmation required
(6) sensor unit detected, needs to be confirmed
(8) supply voltage is too low
variables.name: CPQWCRM-MIB::cpqWcrmWaterCoolUnitStatus

description: URL of the management interface in the format http[s]://ipaddr[:port#][/page]
variables.name: CPQWCRM-MIB::cpqWcrmURL
